FuncDef: Use the display arp count command to display the number of the specified ARP mapping entries. If no parameter is specified, the total number of ARP mapping entries is displayed. Related command: arp static , and reset arp .
CLIs: display arp count [ [ dynamic | static ] [ { begin | exclude | include } <text> ] | <ip-address> ]

ParaDef.Info: Counts the dynamic ARP mapping entries.
Counts the static ARP mapping entries.
{ begin | exclude | include } text : Regular expression, where:
Counts the ARP mapping entries from the first ARP entry that contains the string given by the text argument.
Counts the ARP mapping entries that do not contain the string given by the text argument.
Counts the ARP mapping entries that contain the string given by the text argument.
String used to filter ARP mapping entries.
IP address. The ARP mapping entries containing the IP address are to be counted in.

msg: Error CLI:display arp count [ [ dynamic | static ] [ | { begin | exclude | include } <text> ] | <ip-address> ]
